titles.title: Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary" / Mäṣḥafä ṭomar "Book of the Letter (from Heaven)" / Śǝrʿatä fäws mänfäsawi “Order of Spiritual Medicine”

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary" (fols. 3ra-61vb) I-1) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah (fols. 3ra-7rb) I-2) Introductory exhortation and hymns (fols. 7rb-9vb) I-3) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki ... "I worship Thee ..." (fols. 9vb-10va) I-4) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary": 52 miracles (fols. 11ra-61vb) II) Mäṣḥafä ṭomar "Book of the Letter (from Heaven)" (fols. 62ra-66va) III) Śǝrʿatä fäws mänfäsawi “Order of Spiritual Medicine” (fols. 66va-68va), unidentified
Additio 1.

donors.donor: Gäbrä Mäsqäl and ʾAmätä Ṣǝyon Wälättä Giyorgis are mentioned in supplication formulas throughout Text I and in the concluding formula of Text II.

txstates.txstate: The Ms. is very worn; many leaves are stained with wax. Both boards are broken and crudely repaired. The Ms. was crudely resewn; the detached leaves of quire I were crudely sewn together. Tear amended in fol. 62.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (both boards are broken and repaired). Two pairs of sewing stations.

squires.squire: A(2; s.l.: 1, stub after 2; 2 no stub/fols. 1r-2v) – I(8/fols. 3r-10v) – II(8/fol. 11r-18v) – III(8/fols. 19r-26v) – IV(8/fols. 27r-34v) – V(8/fols. 35r-42v) – VI(10/fols. 43r-50v) – VII(8/fols. 51r-58v) – VIII(10/fols. 59r-68v) – B(3; s.l.: 3, stub before 1/fols. 69r-71v).

taunit.rl-info:
Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling, in fol. 54rb under the bottom line.
The scribe did not use the bottom ruled line in fols. 3r-4v.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: The handwriting becomes less regular on some folios (cp. fols. 43v, 45v).

rubrications.rubrication: Name of St. Mary; names of the donors; groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1 and I-4; incipit of all other texts, incipit of sections of most of the texts and section numbers of Text I-4; the words sälam "salutation" in Texts I-1 and ʾesäggǝd "I worship" in Text I-3; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I-1 contains: - Ṣälotä zä-yǝbǝl ʾǝmqǝdmä yanbǝbu täʾamriha lä-ʾәgzǝʾtǝnä Maryam ... "Prayer recited before reading the Miracles of our Lady Mary ...") (fols. 7ra) - Excerpt from the Gospel of John (Jn. 19:25-27) (fol. 7ra-rb).
Text I-2 includes the following hymns: - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl bä-kǝlʾe Maryam Mariham wäladitä ʾamlak ... "O my Lady, Holy Two-fold Virgin Mary, Godbearing ..." (fol. 8va-vb) - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl Maryam Mariham ʾǝmmu lä-ʾIyäsus Krǝstos kähali ... "O my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of Jesus Christ the Almighty ..." (fols. 8vb-9ra l.10)(cp. ChRep no. 373) - Sälam läki ʾo-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl Maryam ʾǝmmä mädḫǝn wä-ʾǝmmä bǝrhan ... "Salutation to you, o my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of the Saviour and Mother of the Light ..." (fol. 9ra l.10-vb).
Some miracles of Mary (Text I-4) are (erroneously) numbered. The 1st and 7th miracle are followed by a hymn: - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam ʾǝm-betä mängǝśt wä-ʾǝm-betä kahǝnät ... "O my Lady Mary, from the house of Kingdom and the house of Priesthood ..." (fol. 12va) - (ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam) ḫoḫǝtä mǝśraq zä-täsämäyki ... "(O my Lady Mary), Threshold of the East have you been called ..." (fol. 20rb).
Text III (different from the work Mäṣḥafä fäws mänfäsawi) is attested also in Mss. DZ-011, MHG-006; it is different from Mäṣḥafä fäws mänfäsawi containede in DD-016 and BGY-002.

additional.det: The note is crudely written in red ink, upside down, partly illegible.

extras.extra: - Spaces for rubricated names of St. Mary or the donor(s) are left unfilled: e.g., fols. 12vb, 15rab, 21ra; occasionally marked with parallel lines: fols. 47vb, 50ra, 55rb, 60vb. - Erasures marked with parallel lines: e.g., fols. 18rb, 18vb, 19rb.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: A thread has been inserted in fol. 20, navigating the text.
